# Repository Information

## Description

A Dart library to fetch YouTube transcripts and subtitles. Works with auto-generated and manually created transcripts. No API key required!

## Topics/Tags

When setting up the GitHub repository, add these topics:

```
dart
flutter
youtube
youtube-api
youtube-transcript
youtube-subtitles
youtube-captions
transcript
subtitles
captions
cli
asr
translation
webvtt
srt
csv
json
proxy
innertube
no-api-key
```

## Repository Settings

### About Section

**Description:**
```
Fetch YouTube transcripts/subtitles without API keys. Supports auto-generated & manual transcripts, translations, multiple formats, proxy support, and CLI.
```

**Website:**
```
https://pub.dev/packages/youtube_transcript_api
```

**Topics:** (See list above)

### Features to Enable

- ✅ Issues
- ✅ Discussions
- ✅ Wiki (optional)
- ✅ Sponsorships (optional)

### Branch Protection

Protect `main` branch:
- ✅ Require pull request reviews
- ✅ Require status checks (CI) to pass
- ✅ Require branches to be up to date

### GitHub Actions

Ensure the following secrets/variables are set:
- `CODECOV_TOKEN` - For code coverage reporting (get from codecov.io)

### License

- **Type:** MIT License
- **File:** LICENSE (already present)

### Social Preview

Create a social preview image (1280x640) with:
- Project name: "YouTube Transcript API"
- Subtitle: "Dart / Flutter"
- Key features: "No API Key • Multiple Formats • Proxy Support"
- Logo/icon: YouTube + Dart logos

## README Badges

Update these placeholder URLs in README.md after repository is created:

1. Replace `YOUR_USERNAME` with your GitHub username
2. Set up Codecov.io for coverage badge
3. Verify CI badge URL matches your GitHub Actions workflow

## Pub.dev Publishing

Before publishing to pub.dev:

1. Update version in `pubspec.yaml`
2. Update `CHANGELOG.md`
3. Run `dart pub publish --dry-run`
4. Verify all files are included/excluded correctly
5. Run `dart pub publish`

## Maintenance Checklist

- [ ] Set up GitHub repository with correct name
- [ ] Add topics/tags
- [ ] Enable GitHub Actions
- [ ] Set up Codecov integration
- [ ] Update README badges with correct URLs
- [ ] Create GitHub releases for versions
- [ ] Set up branch protection
- [ ] Add collaborators (if any)
- [ ] Create social preview image
- [ ] Publish to pub.dev
